ack.p: We thank Adam Hogg of Ontario’s Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry (MNRF) for GIS preparation, Jenny Gleeson (MNRF) for project support, Rachel Gagnon for a review of the manuscript, and Jenny Rodgers (MNRF) for final editing. This study received funding through the Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry under the Canada-Ontario Agreement Respecting the Great Lakes Basin Ecosystem (COA)—Climate Change/Biodiversity panel.
